text: Michael "Michel" Pfeiffer (19 July 1925 – 2 January 2018) was a German professional football player and manager. He was born in Eschweiler, Germany. He played for SG Eschweiler, Alemannia Aachen, Rot-Weiss Essen and Fortuna 54 Geleen. He coached Roda JC Kerkrade, Sittardia, SC Schwenningen, Alemannia Aachen, FK Pirmasens, Austria Salzburg, SV Arminia Gütersloh, SV Baesweiler 09, BSV Schwenningen, TuS Langerwehe, Sporting Jeddah and CS Sfax. Pfeiffer died on 2 January 2018 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German football managers Category:German footballers Category:People from Eschweiler Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Michael Pfeiffer
